revised_title: Development of the Skull in Insectivora: A Study on Hedgehogs, Moles, and Shrews
tldr: This article examines the structure and development of the skull in Insectivora, specifically focusing on the hedgehog, mole, and shrew. The author provides a detailed account of the skull's morphology in these low placental mammals, analyzing various stages of their development and comparing them to other mammalian types.
